title: What's new in v2.48.0
content:
Features:
- Guide line system revamp with the addition of perspective points
- Round pixel post-processing

Enhancements:
- Tile duplication
- Canvas resize corner knobs can retain the aspect ratio
- The panel pull tab's touch area is bigger for easier opening/closing
- Added Save to gesture pad and handy joystick
- Some other minor UI enhancements

Fixes:
- Fixed some rare cases where the color bucket disables all tools
- Some rare crashes
